hero.title: Experience Ultimate File Flexibility with 70+ Online Preview
hero.description: Step into the future of digital file management with MuseDAM, offering robust online preview and interaction capabilities for over 70 file formats. Simplify your workflow and enhance productivity with our comprehensive file support.
showcase.title: Supported File Formats Overview
showcase.points.0.description: JPG, PNG, BMP, GIF, TIFF, WEBP, HEIF, PIC
showcase.points.1.description: EPS, SVG, PSD, PSB, AI, SKETCH, XD, JSD, FIG, CDR
showcase.points.2.description: OBJ, PLY, 3DS, GLTF, GLB, FBX, STL
showcase.points.4.description: MOV, FLV, MP4, WEBM, QT, M4V, AVI, MKV, MGE, RMVB, BRM, MPG, TS
showcase.points.5.description: ET, XLS, XLT, XLSX, XLSM, XLTX, XLTM, CSV
showcase.points.6.description: TXT, DOC, DOCX, DOT, DOTX, DOCM, DOTM, WPS, WPT, RTF, HTML
showcase.points.7.description: PDF, PPT, PPTX, PPTM, PPSM, PPSX, PPS, POTX, POTM, DPT, DPS
text-display.title: MuseDAM: Superior File Compatibility for Digital Asset Management
text-display.description: Elevate Your Digital Workflow with MuseDAM's Comprehensive File Support
text-display.points.0.description: Embrace versatility in file handling with support for over 70 file types.
text-display.points.1.description: Boost efficiency with instant online previews, eliminating the need for extra software.
text-display.points.2.description: Ensure accessibility to manage files from any location with an internet connection.
text-display.points.3.description: Enjoy a user-friendly platform for a seamless file management experience.
